metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3625 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: tif_read.c in the tiff2bw tool in LibTIFF 4.0.6 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted TIFF image.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> upstream can't reproduce as of 2018-03-16 we will not be fixing this minor issue, marking as ignored

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
